title: Glamorous Escape in Beverly Hills
description: You’re invited to live like the rich and famous in one of the world’s most elite cities. Putting 90210 on the map, Beverly Hills is home to the crème de la crème of Hollywood and some of the most famous attractions in the world. Hosted in a 1950s landmark hotel much loved by Marilyn Monroe and other stars, the Avalon Hotel Beverly Hills is the perfect place for a VIP stay, just steps away from Rodeo Drive. Includes daily classic breakfast, two cocktail vouchers and a resort fee that includes Wi-Fi and use of the property’s high-end facilities.
offer_address: 9400 W Olympic Blvd, Beverly Hills, CA 90212, USA
